input:
Exercise: choose the most plausible alternative.

I regained composure from my fit of anger.  because... 
- My heart pounded.
- I took deep breaths.

Exercise: choose the most plausible alternative.

The pair of students came under scrutiny by the teacher.  because... 
- The students both received excellent grades.
- Their responses on the assignment were identical.
target: their responses on the assignment were identical.
pred: the students both received excellent grades.
